title: The Synthesis and the Animus
description: In THE SYNTHESIS AND THE ANIMUS, former RDD scientist Antosha Zereoue has returned to Beimeni from the Lower Level, while Captain Broden Barao is challenged by the Liberation Front. As the commonwealth prepares to honor two hundred years of Chancellor Atticus Masimovian's rule, disparate sides will reconcile differences and form an accord with consequences that shake the underground."
author: Raeden Zen
